profile.delete_profile_text: Deleting your Dersu profile is permanent and irreversible, please confirm.

planning.set_activity_reminder: Please don't forget to set an actity in the Terrain tab.

route_details.no_date: Set expedition's departure date and time

conditions.select_explanation: Set date and time in order to access weather and nivology reports.

terrain.no_activities_for_route: No activities defined for this route yet

errors.token: There is an issue with your credentials, please try again.

warning.title: Open Location Settings
warning.text: Dersu uses your location during expeditions, even with the application closed, in order to alert you to potential hazards, relevant weather changes and points of interest. If you wish, you can consult Dersu's privacy policy in the 'Settings' section of the application or at https://dersu.uz/en/privacy. Thanks.
